attributes.action: Claim rights to claim equal pay between collegues/co workers, beit Man or Woman
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I would like to put forward this petition for equal pay, currently the law allows for equal pay for the opposite sex, But what about the same sex, I worked 11 years for an employer in Blackpool not realising that I was being paid less than people of the same sex (male) doing more or less the same work, and these were people who were newly employed people, Did what I considered to be a good/honest/loyal job and the work was always done on time, Why is this allowed in today’s society, if I were a woman getting less than a male colleague there would be comeback against my employer, but not if you are being paid less than a co-worker of the same sex, When I complained to my employer regarding this, their response was, tough! There are 3 million unemployed out there ready to take your job if you don’t like it. 
What I want is equal pay across the board, if you do a job, you have the right to be paid the same rate as the man or Woman doing more or less the same work next to you, They may only get £5 or £10 more per week than you, but its a bag of nappies to a young family, so PLEASE sign my petition because next time it cold be you who is wondering why your employer considers you worth less that the employee next to you.
